attributes.action: make methadrone/mcat/miaow miaow/bubbles a class A drug URGENTLY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mcat is destroying lives. Initially young people assume as it is legal it is ok. I know young people who are addicted and physically and mentally wasting away. They display all the signs of a Heroion addict in their desperation to get some more. I have seen them seriously paranoid, uncharacteristically violent, hallucinating, self harming and in physical pain. I know of dealers who are pushing this substance onto school children. It is destroying lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
